results.name: default/wordpress-d6dcfc956-6fhkm

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: default/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-d6dcfc956-6fhkm], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service can't find ready endpoints because the specified pod isn't ready.  
Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod details using `kubectl describe pod wordpress-d6dcfc956-6fhkm`. 3. Look for issues in events or logs. 4. Ensure readiness probes are correctly configured.
